_header: Mercy abide and look all day
_description: On the Mercy of God — five couplets

BLHar7322.Transcription: ȝif sinne nere merci nere nonWan Merci is cald he comet anonþer merci is rediest wer sinne is mestþer merci is lattest were sinne is lestMerci abidet & loket aldaiWan mon fro sinne wil torne away
BLHar7322.Note: Three couplets, written as prose inserted into Latin, with Latin text separating couplets; third couplet begins “Merci abidet.“

NLS18721.First Lines:
Merci abid an loke al dayWan man fro senne wil wende
                    awey…
NLS18721.Last Lines:
…& comen to þat iche blisse toÞat euere sal
                    lesten withouten wo
